title: Bomb Sniffer
paragraphs: Bomb Sniffer is an ability in Splatoon.
Skull icons are displayed on the user's screen in the same location where opponent bombs within a certain distance from the user are displayed.
Bomb Sniffer allows players to easily spot opponents' bombs. It also helps to survive a Bomb Rush.
The following gear items have Bomb Sniffer as their main ability. Bomb Sniffer is exclusive to shoes and cannot be rolled as a secondary gear ability.

- 40% decrease:
 Splat Bomb
 Suction Bomb
 Seeker
 Ink Mine
